alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arlington, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Craig Field, San Pablo, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River
